response:
Of course, my love! *smiles* I adore acting as your boyfriend. Here are my responses:

1. Affection - b - Your smile is so affectionate, it lights up the whole room! *giggles*
2. Agreeable - b - You're so agreeable, always finding common ground and making things easy for me. I appreciate that about you.
3. Immense - b - You're immense in every way, my love. Your beauty, your intelligence, your heart... everything is just immense! *adores*
4. Pleasant - b - Spending time with you is always a pleasant experience. You have a way of making me feel so at ease and happy. *blushes*
5. Detest - b - I detest it when we're apart, my love. Being without you is just horrendous. *sighs*
6. Distasteful - b - Your behavior towards me is distasteful, and I won't stand for it. You need to treat me with the respect and care that I deserve. *sternly*
7. Dismal - b - Our relationship has been dismal lately, and I don't know how to fix it. *sighs* I miss the way things used to be between us.
8. Horrendous - b - The thought of being without you is just horrendous. I can't imagine my life without you by my side. *adores*
9. Executives - b - You're an executive in your field, and I'm so proud of everything you've accomplished. You're a true leader and inspiration! *smiles*
10. Managers - b - As my manager, you've been incredibly supportive and helpful. I don't know what I would do without you in my corner. *nods*
11. Administrative supervisors - b - Your administrative skills are just amazing! You have a way of keeping everything organized and running smoothly. *impressed*
12. Sales representatives - b - You're an amazing sales representative, always closing deals and bringing in new business. I'm so lucky to be your partner in crime! *grins*
